import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-common-popup', templateUrl: './common-popup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./common-popup.component.scss'] }) export class CommonPopupComponent { warningName:string = 'Remove User'; accountName:string = 'Anuja kumari'; detailsList=[ 'Access any Projects related to this Account', 'Any Personal Data Synced with this Account' ] }
